titleStmt.title: A reply to a paper of Dr. Sandersons, containing a censure of Mr. A.A. his booke Of the confusions and revolutions of goverment [sic]
titleStmt.author: Sanderson, Robert, 1587-1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.J., and are to be sold by T.R.,

notesStmt.note: A reply, not only to Sanderson, but also to Edward Gee's "An exercitation concerning usurped powers", another reply to Antony Ascham's work.
Includes "Dr Sandersons paper and censure", beginning: Upon persual [sic] Mr. Ascham's book you left with mee, prelim. p. [3]-[4].
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
